name: The Stone
description: You will play the role of Jake, the hero of the story, falling in love with Aurora, daughter of the President. You will explore VR style designed science fiction world of Galactic Federation and the spiritual world of “Pioneer” of ancient world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or greater Storage: 3 GB available space
